disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Voracity.

blurb.value: Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds. If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

description.value: Innate: Whenever an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of Katarina damaging them, her abilities' current  cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.

description2.value: Innate - Sinister Steel: Whenever Katarina retrieves a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing 68 − 240 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 55 / 66 / 77 / 88% (based on level) AP) magic damage and reducing Shunpo's current  cooldown by 78 / 84 / 90 / 96% (based on level).

description4.value: Daggers take 1 second to land, and will disappear after being on the ground for 4 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Voracity's cooldown reduction will still take effect even after Katarina dies. The Dagger's area of effect indicator is displayed even before it lands, although Katarina may not slash until it has. This can be targeted by Shunpo.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Bouncing Blade.

blurb.value: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.

description.value: Active: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target enemy that bounces to up to 2 nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to each target.

description2.value: The Dagger then lands on the ground 350 units opposite from where it struck the target.

description3.value: The Dagger bounces to targets regardless of having sight of them or not.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Bouncing Blade will not be destroyed in-flight if the target dies before reaching them but it will on clones that expire.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Preparation.

blurb.value: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.

description.value: Active: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air above her current location, gaining ghosting and a decaying  bonus movement speed until it lands after 1.25 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Shunpo.

blurb.value: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.

description.value: Active: Katarina instantly blinks to the target location around the target non- ward unit or Dagger, dealing magic damage to the nearest enemy in range.

description2.value: Shunpo resets Katarina's basic attack timer.

description3.value: Upon blinking, Katarina remains unable to act via a cast time for 0.15 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * If Katarina Shunpo's on an ally, any attack command she is given during its cast time will be negated, and every movement command will be delayed by 1 second (starting at the start of the cast time). Shunpo should be an instant ability but it has extra logic to consider which makes it have a short cast time before blinking. Flash can be used during cast time but it will not cancel the blink. If the target is very close to a wall and Katarina targets Shunpo behind the target, she can blink over the wall. Type Cast time Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Disabled Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled All the other item-actives are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Disabled Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death, unless protected by Resurrection

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Death Lotus.

blurb.value: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

description.value: Active: Katarina rapidly spins in place for 2.5 seconds, throwing a dagger every 0.166 seconds to up to 3 nearby enemy champions, dealing magic damage and grievously wounding them by 60% for 3 seconds.

leveling.value: Magic Damage Per Dagger:»25 / 31.25 / 37.5 / 43.75 / 50 (+ 22% bonus AD) (+ 19% AP)«Total Single-Target Damage:375 / 468.75 / 562.5 / 656.25 / 750 (+ 330% bonus AD) (+ 285% AP)

description2.value: A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability. Katarina does not need to have sight of the target to hit them, and she will prioritize the closest ones.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Death Lotus will not end if there are no enemies that remain in range. Spell shield will block and be consumed by only one dagger. The following table refers for interactions while Katarina is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled in the first and last 0.25 seconds of channel, otherwise, interrupts. Abilities Interrupts Movement Disabled in the first and last 0.25 seconds of channel, otherwise, interrupts. Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Hextech GLP-800 Tiamat Ravenous Hydra Interrupted by All item-actives not specified above interrupt Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled Recall Hexflash Interrupted by Flash Teleport Interrupted by Death Silencing effects
